snippet: General Manager Glen Grunwald and Coach Mike Woodson spoke as if Rasheed Wallace would be with the team for training camp, but the player has not signed a contract yet.
abstract: General Manager Glen Grunwald and Coach Mike Woodson spoke as if Rasheed Wallace would be with the team for training camp, but the player has not signed a contract yet.

headline.main: Knicks Still Think Wallace Will Be in Camp
